author: Rhett Jones
title: Trump’s Crypto Is Crushing MAGA’s Pocketbook
description: The meme coin launched by the President-elect on January 18, just two days before his return to the White House, has lost more than half its value in less than five months.
content: During his first term, Donald Trump mocked the crypto industry, calling it highly volatile and based on thin air. But four years later, he returned to the campaign trail with a different pitch: Make … [+6294 chars]
